1.title: Grand Opening
1.plot: Meet the guys of the newly minted Grabuone Outfitters Depot as they prepare to open for business on the Mississippi Delta. Shane and Mayes are on the water with the first official customers of the Grabuone experience. Jimmie takes Brent shopping to gussy up his look, while the rest of the guys busy themselves with the Grand Opening preparations.

2.title: Daddy's Girl
2.plot: As their business takes root, it's garnering some attention from a local marketing maven who pays a visit to the depot with a proposal. Jimmie's attention is sidetracked with his daughter Anna's new beau, and Shane and Brent take some hipsters out on the lake for a day of grabbin' "before it goes mainstream".

3.title: As Seen on TV
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: As Seen on TV
4.plot: To show their community 'spirit', the Grabuone boys are lending their celebrity by making a commercial for a local restaurant. Brent's tasked with taking care of the kids and household chores for the day and Rigby and Brad are guiding some yoga instructors on zen and the art of snake grabbing.

5.title: Gruelling Banjos
5.plot: Mike, the man of mystery has a blast from the past when some of his musician friends show up on the depot doorstep. Brad, Rigby and Mayes are tasked with keeping Mississippi beautiful, but uncover some truths about the universe, while Shane battles questions about his own personal legacy, and what he'll leave behind.

6.title: GunBelievable!
6.plot: It's Papa Joe's birthday and Rigby needs a gift and Brent has just the thing! Mayes goes to his daughter's ballet recital rehearsal and gets roped into participating, while Brad and Jimmie show some troubled youths some tough love on the water.

7.title: Mr. October
7.plot: The boys are encouraged to step up their marketing game by posing for a sexy calendar. Brad and Brent are guiding some special ladies on a snake grab, while Mayes and Shane try to enjoy a peaceful day of fishing.

8.title: PawnMasters
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: Two Left Feet
9.plot: A slandering newspaper article has the boys spitting mad and leads them to challenge their rivals to a grudge-match softball game. Rigby's acting strange and has the guys worried for his health, and a local family wants to try their hands at snake grabbing!

10.title: Cock of the Wok
10.plot: Brad wants his anniversary to be perfect, but Shane isn't sure Brad's wife will like what he has in mind. Jimmie and Mayes are guiding a local burlesque troupe as payback for some earlier services rendered, and Brent and Rigby battle it out over who's the cock of the walk when it comes to cooking chili!

11.title: The Art of Seduction
11.plot: Jimmie and Rigby are doing a promo tour to help boost buzz for the Snake rodeo, Brad and Mayes are guiding a barbershop quartet from Arkansas, and Brent is in search of the perfect birthday gift for his wife, Angie.

12.title: The Snake Rodeo
12.plot: Mike is swamped with the snake rodeo only days away and needs to hire some help around the office. The boys are busy with preparations for the first 'official' snake rodeo since the depot opened it's doors and Shane receives an offer that could change everything.

imdb.plot outline: Mississippi Snake Grabbers is a lifestyle-reality episodic series featuring 6 Mississippi law enforcement agents (DEA, Bureau of Narcotics, State Troopers, District Attorney, etc) who, on the weekends head out to the wilds of Mississippi and catch snakes with their bare hands. The idea of the series is that the 6 guides take out a group of 'civilians' and teach them how to hand-grab snakes!
imdb.title: Mississippi Snake Grabbers
plot: _Mississippi Snake Grabbers_ (qv) is a lifestyle-reality episodic series featuring 6 Mississippi law enforcement agents (DEA, Bureau of Narcotics, State Troopers, District Attorney, etc) who, on the weekends head out to the wilds of Mississippi and catch snakes with their bare hands. The idea of the series is that the 6 guides take out a group of 'civilians' and teach them how to hand-grab snakes!::Anonymous
